attributes.action: I would like to start a petition for Congestion Charge on the weekend,
attributes.additional_details: Because it wrong and a disgrace we live in a Country highlighting everyday well being spend time with families as much as you can yet you want us to pay £15, If you want to go to see anybody you have to wait till after 10pm and aim to be home before 7am who does that! By avoiding CG the other routes will be more packed with cars on the road it does not make sense
attributes.background: I would like Government  to remove the charge for the weekend.we are already paying the week

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

You can petition the London Assembly directly: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330925
